page.title: 03Family Life
page.content: Family Life The Chudley family on Tuesday. In the Chudley family there is one father , one mother and two daughters Amanda and Lynda. Mr & Mrs Chudley and Amanda get up around 7.00am.Mr Chudley sets off for work taking Amanda with him and drops her off at her school in Exeter at about 7.45am .Lynda gets up around 8.00am.At 8.45am Mrs Chudley and Lynda leave. Mrs Chudley goes to the White Hart Hotel to work. Lynda comes to Moretonhampstead County Primary school.At 2.30pm Mrs Chudley leaves work and then goes shopping.At 3.30pm she picks Lynda up from school then they return home.Around 5.30pm Mr Chudley and Amanda return home.At 6.00pm the Chudleys sit down to a family meal.At 9.30 Amanda and Lynda go to bed.The parents go to bed at 10.
